mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg, g.comName, g.comSubway, g.comArea, g.oaddress, g.address, g.detailaddress from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} or c.cateCodeRef = #{cateCodeRef} order by gdsDate desc

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg, g.comName, g.comSubway, g.comArea, g.oaddress, g.address, g.detailaddress from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} order by gdsDate desc

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg, g.comName, g.comSubway, g.comArea, g.oaddress, g.address, g.detailaddress from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode
where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} and g.comArea = #{comArea}
and gdsPrice BETWEEN #{gdsPrice} AND 100000000
and gdsPrice < 1000000
and gdsPrice BETWEEN #{gdsPrice} AND 2000000
and gdsPrice BETWEEN #{gdsPrice} AND 3000000
and gdsPrice BETWEEN #{gdsPrice} AND 5000000
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (tbl_cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg, g.comName, g.comSubway, g.comArea, g.oaddress, g.address, g.detailaddress from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount})
insert into tbl_order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount, orderDate from tbl_order where userId = #{userId}

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
